input.sentences: this is my dog with purple bows on her ears .
this is my cat . my dog an cat get along well .
we are celebrating our collective birthdays today with a beautiful cake .
it is yummy too . we scarfed up more than half of it .
what a wonderful and beautiful day to celebrate .
output.sentences: I sure love my big buddy Spike.
What good company to help me celebrate my birthday.
Just don't give those guys any cake.
Thanks for the beautiful birthday flowers.
